text: The Pirate Party UK (often abbreviated PPUK; in ) is a political party in the United Kingdom. The Pirate Party's core policies are to bring about reform to copyright and patent laws, support privacy, reduce surveillance from government and businesses, and support freedom of speech and freedom of expression. \- OUR OPEN MANIFESTO FOR THE SNAP GENERAL ELECTION (Pirate Party UK, 2017 general election manifesto). Accessed via the Pirate Party UK's official website. Retrieved 7 April 2018. The party was founded on 30 July 2009 and dissolved on 9 November 2020. The party was started up again in 2023. == References == == Other websites == * Official website Category:2009 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:2020s disestablishments in the United Kingdom Category:2020 disestablishments in Europe Category:2023 establishments in Europe Category:2020s establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Political parties in the United Kingdom
title: Pirate Party UK
